name: The Mirror (AnachronisticTech)
description:
"The Mirror" is a short co-operative puzzle platform game built in Unreal Engine 4 for the Warwick Game Design GameJam on "Reflections". It has a single level with two short puzzles designed to be solved by two players in split-screen. 

**NOTE**: This game is a proof-of-concept, not a full game. It was built in 48 hours.
